attributes.action: "STOP" the 15% Vat on Food and essentials.
attributes.additional_details:
It has been announced in the Daily Mirror dated Tuesday 19/11/2013
That the Tories are planning to and I quote "slap 15% VAT on essentials including children's clothes". unqoute.
I like most of us feel that "enough is Enough" when it comes to "TAXES". So if you "DO NOT WANT" to see the 15% VAT added on to food and essentials, lobby the Government "NOT" to impose this daylight robbery tax, and sign this E-petition 100,000 signatures is all it needs to stop this plan getting through.  So come on show your support and Sign up.
